dmca.title: Demand That You Cease Hosting www.shell-oil.biz
dmca.body:
-----Original Message-----
From: Laura Pirri [mailto:laurapirri@quinnemanuel.com]

Posted To: Legal Response
Conversation: RE: Demand That You Cease Hosting www.shell-oil.biz
Subject: RE: Demand That You Cease Hosting www.shell-oil.biz



Dear Ms. Almeida:

We represent Shell Oil Company.  Under the Online Copyright Infringement Liability
Limitation Act, 17 U.S.C.
dmca.principal_name: Quinn Emanuel Urquhart Oliver & Hedges, LLP
